item.description:
Agenda

11:30 - 12:00 PM - Open Networking

12:00 -12:30 - Lunch Is Served

12:30 - 12:45 - Introductions

Tell us in less than 1 minute who you are, what you do, what you're promoting so we can help you build your business!

12:45 - 1:15 - Presentation

Breakthrough to Your Best Year Yet

Learn what 80% of all businesses never do and it shows. Find out the best time to do long-term planning.
Discover how easy it is to set a strategic plan for your business. Kickstart your business now to achieve every goal you set.

In this presentation Kerri Salls, The Goal Achievement Expert, will ignite your planning, solutions and
strategies to break through to your best year yet.

Learn How To:

·          Position your business for massive growth

·          Thrive in any economy

·          Align two pieces of your plan that must agree

·          Map out the fastest way to achieve your 2011 goals

·          Create your own 2012 implementation plan to achieve big bold goals

 

One of the top goal achievement experts in the world, international business speaker, Kerri Salls, works with entrepreneurs around the globe to establish a strong foundation to systematize and leverage their expertise to catapult their business to the next level and achieve breakthrough results, where every goal they set gets done.

With over 30 years experience in the field, Kerri regularly trains audiences of entrepreneurs, business owners, professionals and leaders stuck at the starting line of setting goals who are ready to do what it takes to join the 5% of all business owners who achieve their goals.

She specializes in helping people like you with families like yours to systematize and leverage what you do best to achieve the lifestyle of your dreams, live your legacy now and leave your dynasty. If you can conceive and believe in your business, you can achieve your goals. Kerri can help make that happen.

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network

item.name: DARE Networking Luncheon
